revised_title: Anatomy and Bone Structure of Megatherium: Anterior Extremities
tldr: The author examines the bones of the anterior extremities of the Megatherium, an extinct giant ground sloth, and compares them to those of other animals. They describe the unique features of the Megatherium's scapula, clavicle, and humerus, and discuss the implications of these findings for understanding the anatomy and evolution of this fascinating creature.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Comparative Anatomy
